about_the_game:
This is a 4K wallpaper collection for the game Race of Life. It contains 50 wallpapers. These wallpapers are created in a non-canonical style, offering a fresh and unique visual experience.

To access the wallpapers:

1. Right click on "Race of Life Act 1" in your Steam library.
2. Click "Properties".
3. Click "Installed Files".
4. Click "Browse".
5. Wallpapers are located in the "Digital Extras" folder.

content_descriptors.notes: The Wallpapers in this DLC depict partial nudity that might not be suitable for everyone.

detailed_description:
This is a 4K wallpaper collection for the game Race of Life. It contains 50 wallpapers. These wallpapers are created in a non-canonical style, offering a fresh and unique visual experience.

To access the wallpapers:

1. Right click on "Race of Life Act 1" in your Steam library.
2. Click "Properties".
3. Click "Installed Files".
4. Click "Browse".
5. Wallpapers are located in the "Digital Extras" folder.
